pages.text: $(bgreen)Spike Rock$() just got back from a trip to Europe. He never knew they made museums so big, or put so many paintings in them. That was a big surprise for him.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)150$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)很慢$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)close attack$() plant that deals damage to any grounded enemy that $(l)walks on top of him$() every 2 seconds.

$(bpurple)Special :$() Most zombies $(l)can't track him as target$(). It can $(bred)pop many tires of cars$().$(br)$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will obtain $(l)several chances$() to resist crush damage.
